meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Culbertson James Caparas David Siegel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2509.

td.p: Michael Culbertson, a U.S. Army sergeant major from Fort Meade, Maryland
James Caparas, a volunteer worker from Washington, D.C.
David Siegel, a paralegal from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $32,200)

tr.td: AUSTRIA
THE COMICS
ARCHITECTURE
20th CENTURY AMERICA
KINGLY NICKNAMES
ABBREV.

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_4', 'clue_J_3_4_stuck', '(David: What is a pediment?)
(Alex: A what?)
(David: A [*].)
(Alex: You said pediment?)
(David: Okay.)
(Alex: Then I have to rule against you.)
(David: That\'s cool.)
(Alex: And since we now have the correct response we cannot go to James or Michael. We have to accept the first thing you say.)

pedestal

David
Triple Stumper
')
